name: The Alabaster Dragon Princess' Rescue
text: Choose one, if you control a light J/resonator and another water J/resonator, you may choose both - Force 1. Search your deck for a light or water resonator with total cost X or less, where X is the result of the roll, and put it into your field. Then shuffle your deck; or Force 1. You gain 200 life multiplied by the result of the roll.
